scripts.build: mkdir -p ../release/project-insights && cp ../manifest.json ../release/project-insights/manifest.json && cp styles.css ../release/project-insights/styles.css && bun build src/main.ts --outfile ../release/project-insights/main.js --target browser --format cjs --external obsidian --external electron --external @codemirror/state --external @codemirror/view --external @codemirror/language --external @codemirror/search --external @lezer/common --external @lezer/highlight --external @lezer/lr
scripts.dev: mkdir -p ../release/project-insights && cp ../manifest.json ../release/project-insights/manifest.json && cp styles.css ../release/project-insights/styles.css && bun build src/main.ts --outfile ../release/project-insights/main.js --target browser --format cjs --external obsidian --external electron --external @codemirror/state --external @codemirror/view --external @codemirror/language --external @codemirror/search --external @lezer/common --external @lezer/highlight --external @lezer/lr --watch
scripts.install:link: bash -lc 'if [ -z "${OBSIDIAN_VAULT_PATH:-}" ]; then echo "Set OBSIDIAN_VAULT_PATH, e.g. OBSIDIAN_VAULT_PATH=\"$HOME/Documents/MyVault\" bun run install:link"; exit 1; fi; PLUGINS_DIR="$OBSIDIAN_VAULT_PATH/.obsidian/plugins"; TARGET="$PLUGINS_DIR/project-insights"; mkdir -p "$PLUGINS_DIR"; ln -sfn "$PWD/../release/project-insights" "$TARGET"; echo "Linked $TARGET -> $PWD/../release/project-insights"'
